lyrics.stanza: Thou art fairer than the morning, O my Savior and my King! Of Thy grandeur and Thy beauty, How my soul delights to sing.
Thou art fairer than the morning, Thou art brighter, brighter than the day; At the glory of Thy presence Clouds and darkness flee away.
Clothed in light as with a garment, Crowned with majesty divine, Lo, the scepter of dominion Now and ever, Lord, is Thine.
O the greatness of Thy mercy, And the richness of Thy grace! O the love that in Thy kingdom Is preparing me a place!
When at last I reach the kingdom, Win the crown, the battle o'er, With ten thousand times ten thousand I shall sing forevermore.
